yards p purl link to video cm centimeters st - stitch mt meter sts stitches mm - millimeters k2tog knit 2 together link to video gm - gram p2tog purl 2 together link to video oz ounce ssk slip slip knit link in video round round yarn aran weight yarn the original yarn used in the pattern alize wooltime 2 skeins 75% wool 25% polyamide 3 53 oz/219 yds 100 gm/200 mt i can also recommend the following yarns regia 6-ply 1 skein 75% wool 25% polyamide 5 3 oz/276 yds 150 gm/252 mt or novita 7 brothers 2 skeins 75% wool/ 25% polyamide 3 53 oz/219 yds 100 gm/200 mt more socks yarn webs usa knitpicks europa lovecrafts uk woolwarehouse sew-shop i also recommend choosing a thread with a small amount of polyamide in the composition this will make your socks stronger needles and accessories  circular needles 31 -40 80-100 cm long and the magic loop technique or one set of 4 double pointed needles size 21/ us 3 00 mm or size needed to obtain gauge try both and use whichever 2 you are most comfortable with  tapestry needle  scissors  stitch marker optional gaude stockinette stitch 25 sts and 32 row = 4 inches 10 cm © 2024 cozysocksstore all rights reserved all patterns and photographs are the property of yulia ilinkova cozysocksstore and are purchased under the agreement that the patterns and photographs cannot be distributed copied in part or in whole re-written or re-sold without permission for personal non-commercial use only e-mail cozysocksstore@gmail com 2 start knitting i used the magic loop method but you can use a set of 4 double pointed needles simply divide into 3 needles first needle 24 stitches second needle 12 stitches third needle 12 stitches when knitting the heel flap you have to join the stitches of the second and third knitting needles to one knitting needle cuff cast on 48 sts divide into 24 sts on circular needles join to work in the round being careful not to twist place marker
